thread.section_title: Hotel Saint-Marc - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic location
thread.title_full: Fantastic location - Review of Hotel Saint-Marc, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AussieGirlExplore
title: Fantastic location
text:
I booked this hotel after reading the great recommendation on TripAdvisor and was not disappointed. The hotel is literally 3 minute walk from the metro. We stayed in room 205, and found the room to be very spacious. However the room did seem to be let in the street noise at night. Looking at the rooms map I think rooms facing the inner courtyard would not have this problem.
I would highly recommend booking the spa for an hour in the morning as it was such a lovely way to start the day.
Room Tip: If you want a quiet room I would recommend one of the room facing towards the courtyar See more room tips
